content: you can read this pattern for free on my blog https //www dublinbaycrochet com/blog/free-granny-square-crochet-sweater-pattern crochet this gorgeous cardigan made of daisy granny squares this statement cardigan includes modern ribbing balloon sleeve comfortable collar and buttons what s great about this cardigan is that you can easily adjust the length by adding or removing squares to make it just right for you and with sizes ranging from xs to xxl finding your fit is a breeze ☑ instant download pdf file for daisy dreams crochet cardigan pattern ☑ sizes this pattern is written in 6 sizes from extra small to double xl xs to xxl finished bust measurements in cm and inches 96/37 5 110/43 120/47 132/49 144/52 154/60 5 ☑ language american terms written in english this crochet pdf file has 20 pages and includes pictures and step by step directions to create this beautiful crochet cardigan ☑ you will need any aran or worsted weight yarn ☑ you could use any yarn from your stash and play with different colour combinations here s what you will need even use dk yarn as long as you meet the gauge indicated in the pattern here s what i ve used any worsted or aran yarn i used nepal by drops worsted 75 m per 50 gr ball 65% wool 35% alpaca lemonade 8919 - colour a- 2 2 2 2 2 3 balls off white 0100 - colour b 4 5 5 6 7 7 balls medium pink 3270 colour c- 12 12 13 13 14 19 balls 5 or 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch markers scissors and measuring tape i hope you like this pattern and enjoy making it if you enjoy making this pattern i would love to know join me on instagram https //www instagram com/leonela diy/
